name: This Title is Interesting
description:
This Description is Interesting

This Title is Interesting (TTII) is a game developed by Vercyx for the Community Game Jam. In TTII, you play as a character with the ability to walk, change time, and change gravity. Throughout the game there is a narrator, constantly telling you truths, lies, and trying to deceive you. Will you be able to see through his deception and get the best ending?

This Gameplay Walkthrough is Interesting

This video shows the full game! Do not watch unless you're stuck, or don't know how to get the best ending.
